name: circuits
description: Circuits for the Opact Wallet project

scripts.build:browser: npx mkdirp browser; yarn run browserify:index
scripts.setup1: cd out && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 18 pot12_0000.ptau -v
scripts.setup2: cd out && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v -e="123"
scripts.setup3: cd out && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup4: cd out && snarkjs groth16 setup transaction.r1cs pot12_final.ptau transaction_0000.zkey
scripts.setup5: cd out && snarkjs zkey contribute transaction_0000.zkey transaction_0001.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v -e="123"
scripts.setup6: cd out && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey transaction_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.fullsetup: yarn run setup1 && yarn run setup2 && yarn run setup3 && yarn run setup4 && yarn run setup5 && yarn run setup6
scripts.circuit:setup: yarn run circuit:compile && yarn run fullsetup
scripts.circuit:tests: mkdir -p out_tests && cd out_tests && circom ../test/circuits/test_utxo.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym --c && circom ../test/circuits/test_merkleproofposeidon.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym --c
scripts.circuit:generate-all: yarn generate-circuit-1x2 && yarn generate-circuit-2x2 && yarn generate-circuit-3x2 && yarn generate-circuit-4x2 && yarn generate-circuit-5x2 && yarn generate-circuit-6x2 && yarn generate-circuit-7x2 && yarn generate-circuit-8x2 && yarn generate-circuit-9x2 && yarn generate-circuit-10x2
scripts.circuit:compile-all: yarn compile-circuit-1x2 && yarn compile-circuit-2x2 && yarn compile-circuit-3x2 && yarn compile-circuit-4x2 && yarn compile-circuit-5x2 && yarn compile-circuit-6x2 && yarn compile-circuit-7x2 && yarn compile-circuit-8x2 && yarn compile-circuit-9x2 && yarn compile-circuit-10x2
scripts.setup4-circuit-1x2: cd out && snarkjs groth16 setup transaction_1x2.r1cs pot12_final.ptau transaction_0000_1x2.zkey
scripts.setup4-circuit-2x2: cd out && snarkjs groth16 setup transaction_2x2.r1cs pot12_final.ptau transaction_0000_2x2.zkey
